greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. satisfies: A(A(x)) = (1+x)^2*A(x).
formula: G.f. A(x) = G(x)^2/x where G(x) is g.f. of A107096.
a(n)=T(n,1), T(n,m)=sum(i=1..n-m, binomial(2*m,i)*T(n-i,m))-sum(k=m+1..n-1, T(n,k)*T(k,m)), n>m, T(n,n)=1. [_Vladimir Kruchinin_ May 03 2012]
program: (Maxima) T(n,m):=if n=m then 1 else sum(binomial(2*m,i)*T(n-i,m),i,1,n-m)-sum(T(n,k)*T(k,m),k,m+1,n-1); makelist(T(n,1),n,1,10); [_Vladimir Kruchinin_ May 03 2012]
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, May 12 2005
